description: Universal CLI orchestrator for multi-project repositories

phases.name: Phase 1: Discovery and Configuration
phases.description: Setup project structure, discovery logic, and configuration management

phases.name: Phase 2: Provider Integration
phases.description: Implement multiple AI provider support with fallback mechanism

phases.name: Phase 3: Task Execution Loop
phases.description: Build the core task execution and status management system

phases.name: Phase 4: Git Workflow Integration
phases.description: Add git branch management and merge capabilities

phases.name: Phase 5: Ollama Integration
phases.description: Integrate Ollama for prompt drafting, summarization, and decision making

phases.name: Phase 6: Reporting and Error Handling
phases.description: Add comprehensive logging, reporting, and error recovery

phases.name: Phase 7: Testing and Validation
phases.description: Create test suite and validate end-to-end functionality

phases.name: Phase 8: Continuous Improvement (Agent Lightning)
phases.description: Implement continuous improvement loop using Agent Lightning for telemetry analysis and automated recommendations

tasks.title: Create MVP task execution engine

acceptanceCriteria: Reads tasks from configuration in order
Executes tasks sequentially (no dependency graph for MVP)

Logs execution progress and provider decisions

do: Implement simple sequential execution for MVP
Include basic error recovery and retry logic
Log detailed provider execution and fallback decisions

tasks.title: Implement MVP execution loop
tasks.description: Create simple main loop for sequential task execution with validation
acceptanceCriteria: Executes tasks sequentially one at a time
For each task: generates prompt -> runs provider -> validates output -> updates status

Continues to next task on success, stops on unrecoverable failure
Logs detailed execution progress and decisions

do: Implement simple sequential processing (no batching for MVP)
Add clear progress reporting to console
Log each step: prompt generation, provider execution, validation
dont: Implement complex batching or parallelism for MVP
